meanings.sent1: She activated the alarm system before leaving the house.
meanings.sent2: The teacher activated the projector to start the lesson.
meanings.sent3: He activated the sprinklers, thinking it was raining inside!
meanings.sent4: The music activated memories of her childhood.

meanings.definition: Cause (a substance or process) to begin.
meanings.sent1: The catalyst activated the chemical reaction in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The heat activated the yeast in the bread dough.
meanings.sent3: The magician activated the potion, turning the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: His words activated a chain of events that changed everything.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight activated the solar panels, providing energy to the house.
